entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
